Body:
clustering_test = DESClustering(create_pool_classifiers * 2, clustering=
    KMeans(n_clusters=2), pct_accuracy=0.5, pct_diversity=0.33,
    more_diverse=False)
X, y = example_estimate_competence[0:2]
clustering_test.clustering.predict = MagicMock(return_value=y)
clustering_test.fit(X, y)
assert clustering_test.performance_cluster_[0, 1
    ] == 0.0 and clustering_test.performance_cluster_[0, [0, 2]].all() == 1.0
assert clustering_test.performance_cluster_[1, 1
    ] == 1.0 and clustering_test.performance_cluster_[1, [0, 2]].all() == 0.0
for idx in clustering_test.indices_[(0), :]:
    assert idx in (1, 3, 4, 5)
